a PhD student under Prof. C. V Jawahar at IIIT Hyderabad. My PhD is partly funded by TCS through the TCS Research fellowship Scheme 2016. My research is in the field of Computer Vision and Machine Learning. Specifically, I look into the problems of OCR in Indian languages and Scene text understanding.
